title: Home
text:
Natasha Vélez


MBA Candidate · Operations & Business Analytics


Production Engineer with experience in operations, logistics and product development. Passionate about turning data into clear, actionable decisions.


MBA @ UCW Operations & Logistics Data-driven decisions Data-driven decisions Data-driven decisions Data-driven decisions







About Me


Natasha is a Production Engineer with more than five years of experience in textile manufacturing, operations, quality and inventory management. Currently pursuing an MBA at University Canada West in Vancouver, she is transitioning into data-informed roles in operations, analytics and supply chain.


Her strength lies in structuring processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams and communicating complex information in a clear and practical way.




Quick Facts


• 5+ years in production & operations • Led teams of up to 30 people • Experience in client-facing and retail roles • Bilingual: Spanish & English





Featured Projects




Healthy Foods Company Case


Redesigned operations and change roadmap.




LLM Evaluation for Supply Chain Decisions


Compared AI models for decision-making.




Leadership Style & Development Plan


Self-assessment and growth roadmap.
